name: NumberPirates
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: number pirates
des:
With the Number Pirates children at pre-school and primary level can playfully learn the numbers from 1 to 10.

The player is on a sea voyage and travels from island to island getting to know the numbers and their written form. At the end of each island the player experiences an adventure with Peter the pirate.

Step by step the children learn three numbers on each island and is practicing them in short and fun games. Overall there are many hours of learning fun waiting for the kids.

The learning is realized absolutely child-friendly and children can handle the skill completely on their own. Due to the varied mini games the adventure stays exciting the whole time. Whenever the kids need a break the skill will remember their progress, so they can continue right where they stopped. It is also possible for several kids to learn with one Alexa, since every kid will save their own progress.

Each island belongs to one animal. When you are on an island you can either learn or practice the numbers for example:

- „Panda learn“
- „Panda practice one“

Possible answers in the games are:

- „yes“, „no“
- „one“, „two“, „three“, „four“, „five“, „six“, „seven“, „eight“, „nine“, „ten“
- „left“, „right“, „middle“
- „wrong“, „right“

Features:

- Over 50 mini games
- Many hours of gameplay fun without repetition
- Exciting pirate adventure
- Child-friendly introduction in the world of numbers
- Progress will be saved
- Different progress for several children is possible
- Visual and auditory arranging of the numbers

Currently Number Pirates is only available for the Echo Show first and second generation and for the FireTV
